name: Re:College
description:
A teenager dating simulator that take place in modern day.

This game ship with limited visual content as the purpose of this game is to allow you to date with as many different type of characters as possible. In this moddable game, you can easily add new characters, personalities and custom events!

So now, you can finally date your sweet and cute waifus in a free visual novel!

----------

This is a very early build so do expect some bugs. Do not hesitate to contact me or post in the Discord if you encounter any problems.

This is a open source game. Download includes both the game and the script. You are not allowed to upload this game to anywhere else without my written permission. If you wish to contribute to the development of Re:College, feel free to contact me at Discord.

---------

Discord: https://discord.gg/9buFPYu

(I do not own background image in the thumbnail. I used a free to use background image and given the proper credits About page - within the game).
